items.sentence: I don't think a native speaker would ever say it that way, but I can understand the intended meaning.
Why did I buy flowers? Why are you asking me such a question? I just bought them because I wanted to.
People always say that when you kiss a frog, it'll turn into a prince, but I've never seen it happen.
One of the most important skills a debater can have is to deliver cogent arguments in a clear manner.
Tom was acquitted of the charge of stealing money from Mary, but was found guilty of attempted fraud.
